application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Demolition of non-original rear garden storage extension, rear balcony and garden stair; demolition and replacement of front boundary wall; reconfiguration of front garden including the installation of a new stair to lightwell; iron railings and gate to front boundary; replacement of lightwell window with French doors; demolition and relocation of side access steps to allow access to repositioned side door; removal of 2no. trees in line with appended tree survey; replacement /reconfiguration of windows on front, side and rear elevations; proposed lower ground floor rear extension and terrace with stair to garden level; reconstruction of existing side/rear extension; excavation below front garden to provide storage space; construction of roof mansard extension with 5o. dormers and 2no. flat rooflights; lowering of lower ground floor level; and internal refurbishment
